item.title: Bridge returned error 500! (18707)
item.content:encoded:
abolishicedenver - Instagram Bridge was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `Unable to find username in search result.`
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Instagram&context=Username&u=abolishicedenver&media_type=all&direct_links=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

item.title: Edna is selling flautas & tacos dorados next weekend!...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

Edna is selling flautas & tacos dorados next weekend! She’s raising money to hire a lawyer for her son’s immigration case once it gets closer to his court date. You can support here: https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co. Unlike in criminal proceedings, people in immigration court have no right to a lawyer, and so anyone who cannot afford one must represent themselves. There are some local stopgap programs, such as the Rocky Mountain Immigrant Advocacy Network, which provides ...free legal services to people in immigrant detention, and the Denver Immigrant Legal Services Fund, which pays immigration attorneys to represent people who would otherwise be unable to obtain a lawyer (disappointingly, the Aurora City Council recently voted not to establish a similar immigrant legal defense fund). Our goal is to create a world where immigration courts don’t exist at all, but while they’re here, we will demand for and help fund legal representation for everyone we can.

#solidaritymeals #sanctuary4all #abolishice #abolishprisons #mutualaid

See More

item.title: Yessenia is back for this weekend's solidarity meals with...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

Yessenia is back for this weekend's solidarity meals with her very popular pupusas! Yessenia is a beloved leader of Sanctuary4All who, like many of you, has been disappointed in the Biden administration so far as they have failed to make immediate restoration to the communities Trump harmed. This includes our own Democratic senator John Hickenlooper, who has not used his new position to provide aid to immigrants like many other Democratic politicians have in other states. It continues to be up to communities to protect and fight for each other rather than the people our taxes pay to represent us to do their job & serve us. We depend on each other. You can help support Yessenia and her family this weekend by ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

item.title: UPDATE Angel's family - Call Governor Newsom at...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

UPDATE Angel's family - Call Governor Newsom at 916-445-2841 and let him know now thanks to his inaction ***Angel has been deported*** and is far from his family. Ask him to stop ICE transfers in California. Keep this from happening to other families!

You could say "I am calling your office to request you end ICE transfers from California prisons. After you allowed ICE to pick up Angel Benito A#204-239-454, he tested positive last month for COVID and is at high risk for serious long term impacts. He's now in a country he's barely lived in without his immediate family."
Abolish ICE Denver Sanctuary4All Colorado Colorado People's Alliance
#StopICEtransfers #100DaysOfFreedom

item.title: “Thus, defenders of the new concentration camps point to...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

“Thus, defenders of the new concentration camps point to televisions and soccer fields and basketball courts. These are ‘more humane’ detention centers according to the ‘don’t criticize Biden’ crowd. Never a thought for the utter inhumanity of the borders themselves, the broken promises to reverse the worst of Trump’s immigration policies, or that Biden is on track to deport 100,000 people more this year than his unhinged predecessor did in his first year in office. The logic of the border, of the violence not only represented by it but actively carried out by the ICE and CBP employees now under Biden’s leadership; these are brushed aside. The frame looks better, so the picture’s violence is now excusable.”

With a disoriented far-right having made its exodus off the most popular social media, we have now entered the historical moment of the Twitter Liberal. They existed before of course, and for some …

to-whom-it-may-concern.org

Bigger Cages, Smarter Bombs

item.title: Abolish ICE DenverTsuru for SolidarityToday, we’re joining Detention Watch Network (DWN)’s “First Ten to Communities Not Cages”...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE DenverTsuru for Solidarity

Today, we’re joining Detention Watch Network (DWN)’s “First Ten to Communities Not Cages” campaign, demanding the shut down of ten immigration detention center...s during the first year of the Biden administration. Visit the #FirstTen action toolkit for ways you can plug into the campaign: bit.ly/FirstTenCNC

To-date Biden has yet to address ICE’s deadly immigration detention system, despite immigration being a priority issue for the administration. COVID-19 outbreaks in detention are ongoing, and 2020 was the deadliest fiscal year in ICE custody since 2005. With detention numbers currently at their lowest in 20 years, #FirstTen to #CommunitiesNotCages underscores the urgent need to shut down detention centers and release people now.

The ‘First Ten’ detention centers are emblematic of how the immigration detention system as a whole is inherently abusive, unjust and fatally flawed beyond repair. #ShutDownBerks #EndFamilyDetention #FreeThemAll

--------

Hoy día estamos uniéndonos a la campaña “Los Primeros Diez a Comunidades Si, Jaulas No” de Detention Watch Network (DWN), exigiendo el cierre de diez centros de detención de migrantes durante el primer año de la administración de Biden. Visite nuestro manual de acción de #FirstTen para varias maneras de unirse a la campaña hoy: bit.ly/FirstTenCNC

Hasta el día de hoy, Biden no ha abordado el sistema fatal de detención de migrantes de ICE, a pesar que inmigración es un tema con prioridad para la administración. Los brotes de COVID-19 en detención continúan, y 2020 fue el año fiscal más letal bajo custodia de ICE desde el 2005. Con los números de detenciones actualmente siendo los más bajos en 20 años, #FirstTen a #CommunitiesNotCages subraya la urgencia necesidad de cerrar centros de detención y liberar a la gente ya.

‘Los Primeros Diez’ centros de detención son emblemáticos de cómo el sistema de detención de migrantes en conjunto es intrínsecamente abusivo, injusto y fatalmente defectuoso más allá de la reparación.

See More

item.title: “They were forcing us out of the dorm, pushing and dragging...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

“They were forcing us out of the dorm, pushing and dragging us,” Fozao said, explaining the altercation when the guards tried to force them to submit to the deportation. “They threatened to call the SWAT team. They said they were going to put all of us into Bravo-Alpha, which is for quarantine, where they keep everyone with coronavirus.”

The Pine Prairie facility, which is operated by the private prison firm GEO Group, currently has 21 confirmed coronavirus cases, according to ICE’s own tracker."

#AbolishICE #AsylumSeekers #BlackLivesMatter #Cameroon

Amid a rush of deportations, four detainees at two different ICE detention centers said that guards threatened to put them in Covid-19 wards.

theintercept.com

ICE Threatened to Expose Asylum-Seekers to Covid-19 if They Did Not Accept Deportation

Amid a rush of deportations, four detainees at two different ICE detention centers said that guards threatened to put them in Covid-19 wards.Amid a rush of deportations, four detainees at two different ICE detention centers said that guards threatened to put them in Covid-19 wards.

item.title: Abolish ICE DenverDenver Agency for Human Rights & Community Partnerships-HRCPEste mensaje se repita en español: Join us a VIRTUAL DACA...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE DenverDenver Agency for Human Rights & Community Partnerships-HRCP

Este mensaje se repita en español:
Join us a VIRTUAL DACA INFO SESSION!

• Denver Office for Immigrant & Refugee Affairs (DOIRA) will cover policy updates;
• L...utheran Family Services Rocky Mountains Refugee & Asylee will discuss application requirements for the #DACA program;
• Denver Human Services will share services/resources available to Denver residents after they obtain DACA status.
Panelist also take general questions from participants.

REGISTER NOW!
March 9 Registration: http://bit.ly/Mar9_DACATownHall
April 6 Registration: http://bit.ly/Apr6_DACATownHall
Spanish interpretation is available. For information, call (720) 417-8482.

If you need a sign language interpreter or CART Services, contact SignLanguageServices@denvergov.org with at least a three (3) business day notice. For other public accommodation requests/concerns related to a disability, please contact DisabilityAccess@denvergov.org.

#DenverLovesImmigrants💞 #DenverDreamers #FamilyBelongsTogether #HereToStay
----------------------------------------------------
¡Únase a nosotros en una SESIÓN DE INFORMACIÓN VIRTUAL sobre DACA!

Panel:
• La Oficina de Asuntos de Inmigrantes y Refugiados de Denver (DOIRA) comparte actualizaciones de la política federal de DACA
• Los Servicios para la Familia Luterana de las Montañas Rocosas explicarán los requisitos de solicitud para #DACA
• Denver Human Services compartirá los servicios / recursos disponibles para los residentes de Denver que tengan el estado DACA.
El panelista también responderá preguntas generales de los participantes.

¡REGÍSTRATE AHORA!
Registro del 9 de marzo: http://bit.ly/Mar9_DACATownHall
Registro del 6 de abril: http://bit.ly/Apr6_DACATownHall
Hay interpretación al español disponible. Para obtener información, llame al (720) 417-8482.

Si necesita un intérprete de lenguaje de señas o los Servicios CART, comuníquese con SignLanguageServices@denvergov.org con un aviso de al menos tres (3) días hábiles. Para otras solicitudes o inquietudes de alojamiento público relacionadas con una discapacidad, comuníquese con DisabilityAccess@denvergov.org.

See More
item.author: Abolish ICE Denver
